title: Epic 2.2: Commerce Tools - Grocery Pricing & Cart Optimization
description: Build the core commerce functionality that finds, prices, and optimizes grocery purchases using the MealMe API integration approach.

subtasks.title: Define TypeScript interfaces for Store, Product, PriceData, and OptimizedCart
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Interfaces accurately model data structures for stores, products with prices, shopping lists

subtasks.title: Define GroceryItem interface with standardization logic
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Handle ingredient → grocery product mapping (e.g., '2 cups flour' → 'All-Purpose Flour 5lb bag')

subtasks.title: Implement mocked findAndPriceGroceries(ingredients, location) function
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Orchestrates store search, product search, and price aggregation

subtasks.title: Create mocked searchStores(location) sub-function
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Returns 2-3 fictional local grocery stores with realistic details

subtasks.title: Implement optimizeCart(priceData, budget) heuristic algorithm
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Takes PriceData object and returns OptimizedCart minimizing total cost

subtasks.title: Define JSON schemas for findAndPriceGroceries and optimizeCart tools
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Schemas describe purpose and parameters of both functions accurately
